languages.text: "О, причины, конечно же, есть. Недостаточные свободы, ограничения в передвижении, несогласие с местным управлением... и это только те, которые можно хоть сколько-то серьезно воспринимать. Людям не нравятся ограничения — особенно если правитель уже проявляет определенное снисхождение к черни, рассчитывая на повышенную трудовую эффективность. Есть те, кто путает лояльность со слабостью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вистенца морщит носик.{/n} "О, причины, конечно же, есть. Недостаточные свободы, ограничения в передвижении, несогласие с местным управлением... и это только те, которые можно хоть сколько-то серьезно воспринимать. Людям не нравятся ограничения — особенно если правитель уже проявляет снисхождение, которое они путают со слабостью".

languages.text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."
languages.original_text: "О, причины, конечно же, есть. Недостаточные свободы, ограничения в передвижении, несогласие с местным управлением... и это только те, которые можно хоть сколько-то серьезно воспринимать. Людям не нравятся ограничения — особенно если правитель уже проявляет определенное снисхождение к черни, рассчитывая на повышенную трудовую эффективность. Есть те, кто путает лояльность со слабостью".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

"Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

"Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

"Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

languages.text: “噢，叛军当然有他们的理由了。不够自由、行动受限、与地方当局发生纠纷什么的……还有很多甚至根本不值得稍微认真对待的理由。没人喜欢受到限制，尤其是当他们的统治者对这群乌合之众表现出了仁慈的态度，希望他们能更有效率地进行生产。总会有些人把仁慈与软弱混为一谈。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

traits.locale_text: “噢，叛军当然有他们的理由了。不够自由、行动受限、与地方当局发生纠纷什么的……还有很多甚至根本不值得稍微认真对待的理由。没人喜欢受到限制，尤其是当他们的统治者对这群乌合之众表现出了仁慈的态度，希望他们能更有效率地进行生产。总会有些人把仁慈与软弱混为一谈。”

languages.text: «No me cabe duda de que tienen motivos, claro. Falta de libertades, restricciones a la libre circulación, disputas con las autoridades locales... y esas son las que puedo tomarme en serio. A nadie le gustan las restricciones, especialmente cuando un gobernante ya ha cedido ante el populacho con la esperanza de que aumente la productividad. Hay quienes confunden la lealtad con la debilidad».
languages.original_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

traits.locale_text: «No me cabe duda de que tienen motivos, claro. Falta de libertades, restricciones a la libre circulación, disputas con las autoridades locales... y esas son las que puedo tomarme en serio. A nadie le gustan las restricciones, especialmente cuando un gobernante ya ha cedido ante el populacho con la esperanza de que aumente la productividad. Hay quienes confunden la lealtad con la debilidad».

languages.text: 「ええ、もちろん反乱にはそれなりの理由があるのでしょう。制限付きの自由、移動の規制、現地当局との争議…これらひとつひとつは些末なものにすぎないのですが。住民は規制を好みません。生産性の向上に励めるようにと、統治者は暴徒にある程度の慈悲を見せているというのに。忠義を弱みと勘違いしている輩がいるのです」
languages.original_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、もちろん反乱にはそれなりの理由があるのでしょう。制限付きの自由、移動の規制、現地当局との争議…これらひとつひとつは些末なものにすぎないのですが。住民は規制を好みません。生産性の向上に励めるようにと、統治者は暴徒にある程度の慈悲を見せているというのに。忠義を弱みと勘違いしている輩がいるのです」

languages.text: "Oh, sie haben ihre Gründe, natürlich. Zu wenig Freiheiten, Bewegungseinschränkungen, Streitigkeiten mit örtlichen Behörden ... und das sind nur die, die man ansatzweise ernst nehmen könnte. Niemand mag Einschränkungen – schon gar nicht, wenn die Herrscherin bereits eine gewisse Nachsicht an den Tag gelegt hat, weil sie hoffte, das würde die Produktivität steigern. Es gibt immer welche, die Loyalität mit Schwäche verwechseln."
languages.original_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, sie haben ihre Gründe, natürlich. Zu wenig Freiheiten, Bewegungseinschränkungen, Streitigkeiten mit örtlichen Behörden ... und das sind nur die, die man ansatzweise ernst nehmen könnte. Niemand mag Einschränkungen – schon gar nicht, wenn die Herrscherin bereits eine gewisse Nachsicht an den Tag gelegt hat, weil sie hoffte, das würde die Produktivität steigern. Es gibt immer welche, die Loyalität mit Schwäche verwechseln."

languages.text: « Oh oui, leurs justifications ne manquent pas. Libertés insuffisantes, déplacements limités, conflits avec les autorités locales... pour ne citer que celles que l'on peut prendre au sérieux. Les gens n'aiment pas les restrictions, surtout après que leur dirigeante a fait preuve d'une certaine indulgence envers eux dans l'espoir d'encourager la productivité. Certains prennent la loyauté pour une faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

traits.locale_text: « Oh oui, leurs justifications ne manquent pas. Libertés insuffisantes, déplacements limités, conflits avec les autorités locales... pour ne citer que celles que l'on peut prendre au sérieux. Les gens n'aiment pas les restrictions, surtout après que leur dirigeante a fait preuve d'une certaine indulgence envers eux dans l'espoir d'encourager la productivité. Certains prennent la loyauté pour une faiblesse. »

languages.text: "Kendilerince sebepleri var tabii: Yetersiz özgürlükler, kısıtlı hareket hakkı, yerel makamlarla anlaşmazlıklar... Ki bunlar az da olsa ciddiye alınabilecek seviyedekiler. İnsanlar kısıtlamaları sevmiyor. Özellikle de yöneticileri, üretkenliği artırmak umuduyla ayaktakımına başta hoşgörü göstermişte. Sadakati zafiyetle karıştıranlar oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Oh, they have their reasons, of course. Insufficient freedoms, restricted movement, disputes with local authorities... and those are only the ones that can be taken even slightly seriously. People do not like restrictions — especially if their ruler has already shown a certain leniency toward the rabble in the hope of encouraging greater productivity. There are those who confuse loyalty with weakness."

traits.locale_text: "Kendilerince sebepleri var tabii: Yetersiz özgürlükler, kısıtlı hareket hakkı, yerel makamlarla anlaşmazlıklar... Ki bunlar az da olsa ciddiye alınabilecek seviyedekiler. İnsanlar kısıtlamaları sevmez... Özellikle de başlarındakiler, üretkenliği artırmak umuduyla ayaktakımına hoşgörü gösteriyorsa hiç sevmez. Sadakati zafiyetle karıştıranlar oluyor."
